# Objective
# User Stories (BDD)

**Scenario: [Scenario Name]**
* **Given** [initial context]
* **When** [event occurs]
* **Then** [expected outcome]
* **And** [additional outcome]

---

# Definition of Done (DoD)
- [ ] **Functional:** [Core logic/feature works as expected]
- [ ] **UI/UX:** [Responsive design, accessible, and matches brand styles]
- [ ] **SEO/Meta:** [Semantic HTML, OpenGraph, and meta tags verified]
- [ ] **Testing:** [Unit, Integration, or E2E tests passing]
- [ ] **Resilience:** [Error handling and fallbacks implemented]
- [ ] **Performance:** [Lighthouse scores / Core Web Vitals targets met]
